headline: How The Investment Story For Hartford Insurance Group (HIG) Is Shifting As Targets Edge Higher
summary: Hartford Insurance Group’s modelled fair value has shifted slightly, with the price target moving from US$149.50 to US$150.85. This aligns with recent Street research, where many firms are nudging targets higher while debating how sustainable current fundamentals and valuation look across P&C and life insurance peers. As you read on, you will see how these small target moves fit into the broader, evolving analyst narrative around Hartford and what to watch next. Analyst Price Targets don't...
